Class ThresholdStoppingCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.iterative.ThresholdStoppingCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, StoppingCondition

    @Immutable
@Shareable
public class ThresholdStoppingCondition
extends java.lang.Object
implements StoppingCondition, java.io.Serializable
    Stop when absolute delta drops below a threshold.

    0.11
